body:
I don't think that the constructors are called in the right order. I now see why you had it this way, but that's not good.

You could fix that construction part by using a pointer, then passing it, but the destruction cannot be fixed because it's the wrong order.

There are ways to fix it, but in general, that is usually just a symptom that the design could probably be improved. Could you re-think that part? I'm happy to chat on another channel if you need input.
